# Interface LLMNodePropsInterface

Interface for LLM Node creation properties.

interface LLMNodePropsInterface {  
executionConfig: [LLMNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface](./graph_nodes_builtin_node_execution_config.LLMNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface);  
id: string;  
llm: [LLM](/classes/primitives_llm_llm.LLM);  
stream: boolean;  
}

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/nodes/builtin/llm_node.LLMNodePropsInterface))

    * LLMNodePropsInterface

## Properties

### executionConfig

executionConfig: [LLMNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface](./graph_nodes_builtin_node_execution_config.LLMNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface)

Execution configuration for the LLM node

### id

id: string

Unique identifier for the node

Inherited from [NodePropsInterface](./graph_nodes_node.NodePropsInterface).[id](./graph_nodes_node.NodePropsInterface#id)

### llm

llm: [LLM](/classes/primitives_llm_llm.LLM)

LLM instance for text generation

### stream

stream: boolean

Whether to stream the generated text
